programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter. Layering unexpected subjects, director Chris Moukarbel explores the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture interwoven with an affair between Cuspert and the FBI translator assigned to investigate him.

programme.title: Contagion (2011)
programme.desc: In this ensemble thriller about a virus that quickly becomes a global pandemic, a husband copes with the sudden death of his wife, while a doctor puts herself at risk to find a cure and an activist blogger stokes societys paranoia.

programme.title: Dead for a Dollar (2022)

programme.title: One Life (2023)
programme.desc: This drama is based on the true story of Sir Nicholas Winton and his heroic deeds during World War II. As a young British broker, he traveled to Prague in 1938, three months after the war broke out. He found destitute Jews who fled Nazi persecution in Austria and Germany. Families were willing to send their children away before the borders closed. Nicholas helps them ship the children out. But in his older years, he is haunted by the thought that he didnt do enough to help more children.

programme.title: Mafia Mamma
programme.desc: A mild-mannered suburban mom unexpectedly inherits her late grandfather's mafia empire in Italy. Guided by the firm's trusted consigliere, she hilariously defies everyone's expectations as she finds herself stuck in the middle of a deadly mob war.

programme.title: Detained
programme.desc: A woman wakes up in a police interrogation room with no memory of the night prior. Something does not seem quite right in this police station.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: While in jail for murdering her husband (Bruce Greenwood), a woman (Ashley Judd) discovers he is living under a new identity with their son.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: A lawyer (Richard Gere) handles the cases of two murderous women (Catherine Zeta-Jones, Renée Zellweger) who are looking to gain celebrity from their public exposure.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: After an ambitious manager (Jamie Foxx) gives them a shot at stardom, three singers learn that fame can carry a high personal cost.

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: Aspiring photographer Therese spots the beautiful, elegant Carol perusing the doll displays in a 1950s Manhattan department store. The two women develop a fast bond that becomes a love with complicated consequences.

programme.title: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Despite warnings to stick to the Appalachian Trail, hikers stray off course and cross into land inhabited by a hidden community of mountain dwellers who use deadly means to protect their way of life.

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: An impossible love blooms across two time periods and continents.

programme.title: North of Normal
programme.desc: Raised in the wilderness, Cea Sunrise Person navigates a complicated relationship with her pot-smoking mother while seeking some semblance of normalcy.

programme.title: Nothing Compares
programme.desc: Following the career of singer Sinéad O'Connor through her rise to fame and how her iconoclastic personality led to her exile from the pop mainstream.

programme.title: The Hours
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Love Story

programme.title: Maggie's Plan

programme.title: The Prince of Tides
programme.desc: Family wounds are healed by a Southerner's (Nick Nolte) affair with his suicidal sister's New York psychiatrist (Barbra Streisand).

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings

programme.title: It Could Happen to You

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: The mutual attraction between a federal marshal (Jennifer Lopez) and an escaped convict (George Clooney) interferes with their goals.

programme.title: NFL Football
programme.sub-title: Green Bay Packers at Detroit Lions
programme.desc: The Packers take a swing at the rival Lions. Green Bay has won three straight since falling 24-14 to Detroit before its bye. The Lions seek their first 11-game win streak in franchise history after hanging on to beat the Bears 23-20 on Thanksgiving.

programme.title: NFL Football
programme.desc: Super Bowl contenders collide as the Ravens host the Eagles. Saquon Barkley racked up a stunning 302 yards from scrimmage with two TDs in the Eagles' Week 12 victory over the Rams. Lamar Jackson (BAL) accounted for three TDs in a win at the Chargers.

programme.title: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Steelers (8-2) and Browns (2-8) renew hostilities. Pittsburgh stands firmly atop the AFC North after beating Baltimore for a fifth straight victory Nov. 17. Steelers kicker Chris Boswell leads all NFL players with 107 points scored this season.

programme.title: NFL Football
programme.sub-title: Kansas City Chiefs at Los Angeles Chargers
programme.desc: The Chargers play the defending champion Chiefs. Los Angeles quarterback Justin Herbert will play despite re-aggravating an ankle injury in a Week 3 loss. Bolts safety Derwin James will miss this contest following a one-game suspension for targeting.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Claire turns to John Grey for comfort as they process difficult news; Ian and Rachel discuss their love and their future; Brianna confronts an intruder at Lallybroch.

programme.title: Renfield
programme.desc: Renfield, the tortured aide to his narcissistic boss, Dracula, is forced to procure his master's prey and do his every bidding. However, after centuries of servitude, he's ready to see if there's a life outside the shadow of the Prince of Darkness.

programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a man witnesses the death of his young son when the boy gets caught in crossfire between warring gangs. Recovering from a wound that cost him his voice, he soon embarks on a bloody and grueling quest to punish those responsible.

programme.title: Holmes & Watson
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and Dr. John Watson join forces to investigate a murder at Buckingham Palace. They soon learn that they have only four days to solve the case, or the queen will become the next victim.

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: Follows four Asian American friends as they embark on an epic, no-holds-barred journey of bonding, belonging and wild debauchery that reveals the universal truth of what it means to know and love who you are.

programme.title: Night Shift
programme.desc: While working her first night shift at a remote motel, a young woman suspects she's being followed by a dangerous character from her past. As the night progresses, things get even worse when she starts to think the place may be haunted.
